name: Flip-Bit
description:
Flip-Bit is a puzzle/platformer game made for a contest on ZFGC.
You have the ability to flip to the other side of whatever you're standing on. The goal is to collect all 128 "bits".

  ~< Controls >~
Arrow Keys - Move
Z or X - Jump
Shift or C - Flip (Only after you get 16 bits)
Esc - Quits the game
M - Mute/Unmute music
